patthana16.69:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.69:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.69:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.69:5.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
